artwork.title: Mona Lisa
artwork.description: A masterpiece by Leonardo da Vinci, celebrated for its mysterious expression and revolutionary use of light and shadow through sfumato.

artwork.title: Girl with a Pearl Earring
artwork.description: Known as the "Mona Lisa of the North," this painting captures a young woman in a strikingly realistic and luminous portrayal.

artwork.title: The Birth of Venus
artwork.description: This mythological depiction of Venus emerging from the sea is celebrated for its elegance and symbolic representation of beauty.

artwork.title: The Kiss
artwork.description: A romantic and decorative painting by Gustav Klimt, notable for its intricate use of gold leaf and abstracted patterns.

artwork.title: Guernica
artwork.description: A powerful anti-war statement by Picasso, depicting the horrors of the Spanish Civil War through fragmented and distorted forms.

artwork.title: The Scream
artwork.description: One of the most recognizable works of art, this painting vividly portrays human anxiety and existential despair through bold colors and swirling forms.
